data.prayer: Father, we pray that the state of Logone Oriental be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Logone Oriental, Chad
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Logone Oriental, Chad.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Logone Oriental, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Logone Oriental, Chad who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Logone Oriental, Chad and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Logone Oriental, Chad to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.section_summary:
the state of Logone Oriental, Chad has a population of 599,000.

We estimate Logone Oriental has 43,599 people who might know Jesus, 109,367 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 446,034 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Logone Oriental access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”
